title: 1 For All
overview: An original comedy sketch web series by Deerstalker Pictures. Follow Evandra the sassy half-elf fighter, Antrius the seductive bard, and Nixie the pyromaniac tiefling sorceress, as they fumble their way through an epic fantasy world, under the guidance of their tireless DM (who plays every single NPC regardless of age, race, or gender).
